name: easy-sqs
description: Simplified Library for using AWS Simple Queuing Service (SQS)
author: Chad Macey <chad_macey@hotmail.com>

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit lib/Tests && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.major: npm version major -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "published to npm as v%s" && git push && npm publish
